subject: Optimization of Planning & Execution of Projects - Approval of LA cases by ‘LA Committee’ in First Stage.
text: HRd& <r TTTHTf xifeasrut TY14 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (437 TarT 311r} TTTTHTf 4774) Y4 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) j-5 & 6, Hazr-10 , ERaT, 7} farit-110075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka New Delhi-110075 NHAI Policy Guidelines/Land Acquisition/2020 No. 7.1.67 dated the 7th August, 2020 Sub:- Optimization of Planning & Execution of Projects Approval of Alignment by the LA Committee (LAC) in First Stage: Refer  Policy Guidelines No. 7.1.61/2009 dated 23.10.2019 vide which a LA Committee was constituted to examine all new proposals for  construction and development of National Highways, as per viability of the project and approve the alignment & LA Plan. The procedure is applicable for all LA cases where land acquisition has not started or land acquisition has reached only 3A stage including balance acquisition activities for viable projects where 3D has reached only for some part of the required land; 2 The procedure for submission of proposals to LA Committee (LAC), alongwith the details of LAC Portal developed for the purpose were notified vide Policy Circular No. 7.1.64 dated 13.12.2019. 3_ In this connection, it is considered that approval of alignment is very vital and hence the LAC needs to consider and finalize the alignment of the project first; before considering LA Plan of the projects. Accordingly, henceforth, there shall be a 2-Stage consideration by the LA Committee for all "Balance For Award (BFA)" Projects, which have not reached 3D notification stage, as under: Stage-1 For consideration and approval of Project Alignment; and Stage-2 For approval of Land Acquisition Plan: 4 Stage-1: The procedure for consideration & approval of Project Alignment by LA Committee shall be as under: (_) As of Feasibility Studyl DPR, the Design Consultant and PD, after site visit, will examine and submit to RO various alternative alignments of the project highway alongwith their merits & demerits, cost comparison of various alternatives (including likely project features, civil work rough cost,; LA cost & other pre-construction costs) and their recommendations on the preferred option. ii) RO shall carry out site inspection, request the State Nodal Officer to convene a meeting of all stakeholders (online or in-person), present the alignment alternatives in such consultation meeting; video record the proceedings take their comments/ recommendations; and issue minutes of such meeting: (iii) After such consultations and due diligence, RO will submit the preferred alignment alongwith the justification to HQ: The concerned Technical Division at HQ will load the details] presentations on LA Portal and present the alternatives & preferred alignment, before the LA Committee in which RO, PD, & Design Consultant will also be present in Video Conference.
